column15: Systematic and comprehensive treatment (such as mechanical life support, immunological modulation, antiviral reagents, etc.) based on the Chinese society of cardiology expert consensus statement on the diagnosis and treatment of adult fulminant myocarditis (PMID:30519877)
column17: Total RNA was extracted from blood serum?750?l?by Trizol Ls?250?l?/chloroform/isopropanol.
column19: Total miRNA from each sample was labeled with Cyanine 3-pCp under the action of T4 RNA ligase according to the Agilent miRNA Microarray Systemwith miRNA Complete Labeling and Hyb Kit protocol (Agilent Technology)
column21: The labeled cRNA over the procession of  inspissation and desiccation and then redissolved with water. 1 ?g of each labeled cRNA was fragmented by adding 11 ?l 10 × Blocking Agent and 2.2 ?l of 25×Fragmentation Buffer, then heated at 60°C for 30 min, and finally 55 ?l 2 × GE Hybridization buffer was added to dilute the labeled cRNA.100 ?l of hybridization solution was dispensed into the gasket slide and assembled to the gene expression microarray slide. The slides were incubated for 17 hours at 65°C in an Agilent Hybridization Oven.
column22: The hybridized arrays were washed, fixed and scanned with using the Agilent Microarray Scanner (part number G2505C).
column23: miRNA expression in  healthy controls blood serum
column24: Agilent Feature Extraction software (version 11.0.1.1) was used to analyze acquired array images. Quantile normalization and subsequent data processing were performed with using the GeneSpring GX v12.1 software package (Agilent Technologies). After quantile normalization of the raw data, miRNAs that at least 4 out of 28 samples have flags in Detected (“All Targets Value”) were chosen for further data analysis. Differentially expressed miRNAs with statistical significance between the two groups were identified through Volcano Plot filtering. Differentially expressed miRNAs between the two samples were identified through Fold Change filtering. Hierarchical Clustering was performed using the R scripts.
